alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 11:02AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum affecting Norman County. .Backwater will contribute to an additional rise in minor flood stage. This forecast takes into account forecasted rainfall through 7 AM Thursday. Additional rainfall is expected after Thursday. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 23.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM CDT Wednesday was 23.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.2 feet this afternoon. It will then rise to 23.8 feet Saturday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
